short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We’re Complete-Reviews, the world's most powerful review platform. We’re here to inspire ever-improving experiences for everyone.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We bring consumers and companies together to continuously share, collaborate, and improve. The power of our platform comes from being open to all consumers and companies, independent of both and transparent.

Use this extension to find out if the company website you're visiting is trusted by your fellow consumers.  Once installed, you can easily gauge people's opinion by looking at the star which will appear next to your bookmark icon.

Read more about Complete-Reviews on https://complete-reviews.com.
